Name: Moeders
Review Text: Fantastic experience in this place entirely dedicated to mothers, many original photos of moms exposed from all eras create a truly touching atmosphere. The food was exquisite; It was a beautiful journey into Dutch culture, very special the ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text: I went there with my boyfriend and this restaurant was our favourite until now! We are from Portugal, but it felt so familiar and cozy, the food looked homemade and very traditional and the concept of the whole restaurant is just the cutest! Will def be coming back üëå

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Loved this restaurant! Very good local food just like you‚Äôre at home thanks to this family vibe (staff and deco). Recommended for sure!

Name: Moeders
Review Text: A really nice, accommodating restaurant.  The staff are super-friendly and the food is of an excellent quality.  Prices are also really fair. ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text:
Mothers are great :) good vibe and very nice staff. Well deserve tips!

Traditional Dutch food here is tasty, but isnt too special imo.

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Moeders is a wonderful restaurant with very true Dutch cuisine as mother made it. It is filled with photos of people‚Äôs mothers, bring your own photo of your mother to add to the decor.

Name: Moeders
Review Text: It‚Äôs hard not to love this place. Friendly and welcoming staff. Photos of loved mothers all over the walls. Fantastic and comforting food. You really can‚Äôt go wrong with anything you order. We were there during the winter and it was the ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Very good option for the ones that like to experience traditional cuisine, what is not easy to find in The Netherlands. The food was really tasty and everything inside the restaurant was made to make you feel "gezellig"! I could taste affection mixed with the food. The lamb was really good!

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Lovely food! Great tasty, cosy atmosphere. Book a table if you intend to have dinner or lunch there as they are always full and mostly booked days ahead. ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text:
Vegetarian friendly :)
Totally wow only by their atmosphere at the beginning, Very friendly staff, great food, totally recommended to come here, I have a very great night here, happy.

Name: Moeders
Review Text:
Very cosy family restaurant. ü•îü•¨üêÑ
They offer hearty traditional dishes and have pictures of mothers hanging all over the walls. ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text:
The place has really a motherly vibe to it that it made me feel emotional the moment I sat on the table (the pictures of mums were also a plus).
The dishes were good and the ambient was really nice. ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Great authentic Dutch restaurant! Definitely a place to eat if you want to discover Dutch cuisine. The food was tasty and we could try a bit a everything (we ordered the Dutch Ricedish menu selection); service was very good. It is recommended to book before if you want a seat.

Name: Moeders
Review Text: This restaurant has been so famous that I am afraid it would taste good, but turn out to be good. And it‚Äôs the most efficient service I experienced recently

Name: Moeders
Review Text: 3.5 stars. Decent traditional Dutch food served by friendly staff. The atmosphere is something else. The walls are covered in photos of mothers with intentionally mismatched plates glasses and cutlery. Very homey and comfortable place to get a decent meal.

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Really welcoming and friendly staff, did not have to wait for food long, so thats great. The food was also great. There are tables inside and outside, with nice view.

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Definitely the place where to taste the Dutch cuisine! Which unfortunately is quite rare to find. ‚Ä¶

Name: Moeders
Review Text:
If you are looking for traditional Dutch food this is the place to go.
Simple with no frills, you will get what you are aiming for !
Nice outdoor seating, service is friendly. Price is correct.
Would recommend when visiting Amsterdam

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Nice restaurant. Typical Dutch cuisine, so nothing really out of the ordinary, but still very good! Staff is polite and available to help!! I recommend the ribs! They are delicious

Name: Moeders
Review Text: Insane food. This was definitely a huge highlight for us on our trip to Amsterdam. Make sure to try the mixed Dutch foods, gives you loads of delicious foods for a good price.
